block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 28 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. The Space Taxi designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. This paper airplane looks as though it has a scalpel for a nose. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
